# Assignments and project

1.  For a selected scenario, code of ethics.

2.  For a selected scenario, prediction target: what, when, for whom; how will results be used?

3.  Identify data set. Summarize prediction target, predictors. Create meta data. Fill in first part of PA toolset?

4.  Data preparation, create predictors. Data model.

5.  Complete first full page of PA toolset - specify learners.

6.  Compare learners in terms of performance.

7.  Compare learners in terms of bias.

8.  Test [link](https://docs.google.com/document/d/15_eYqigQK-7Xlv2YmbChBrXKY5nSCJDo/edit "Assignment 1") to assignments
